definition: to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.english: Please click here for past issues of "e-Newsletter".
sentences.chinese: 查阅前期《电子快讯》请按此。

sentences.english: I'll refer you to the documentation on how that works.
sentences.chinese: 我会指点您去查阅关于如何做这件事的文档。

sentences.english: The clerk assisted the judge by looking up related precedents.
sentences.chinese: 这位书记官协助那位法官查阅有关判例。

sentences.english: Where can I find job opportunities at WHO?
sentences.chinese: 何处可查阅世卫组织的工作机会？

sentences.english: All these usages line up well with the dictionary definitions I turned up.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些用法和我查阅的字典里的含义相当一致。

sentences.english: The clerk assisted the judge by looking up related precedents. Her breathing was assisted by a respirator.
sentences.chinese: 这位书记官协助那位法官查阅有关判例。

sentences.english: By the crook, the cook saw through a cookbook before production nailed cookies.
sentences.chinese: 在溪边，厨子在做钩形饼干之前查阅了一本食谱。

sentences.english: We will be referring back to this shortly.
sentences.chinese: 我们将很快回来查阅此处的信息。

sentences.english: You should see in the paper.
However, law agents' consulting of case materials may not affect the hearing of cases.
sentences.chinese: 但是，诉讼代理人查阅案件材料不得影响案件的审理。

sentences.english: And you don't even have to look it up.
sentences.chinese: 这个你甚至是不需要去查阅的。

sentences.english: Methods Relevant literature of securinine was searched and summarized.
sentences.chinese: 方法查阅并总结有关一叶萩碱的文献资料。

sentences.english: I'll look it up in the encyclopaedia .
sentences.chinese: 我将在百科全书中查阅它。

sentences.english: Please consult the card catalogue or the computer.
sentences.chinese: 请查阅卡片目录或计算机。

sentences.english: Notice is here to inform that the score of PETS can be checked through the campus Network.
sentences.chinese: 本次PETS成绩可以在校园网上查阅，特此通知。

sentences.english: The asterisk refers the reader to a footnote.
sentences.chinese: 星号指引读者去查阅脚注。

definition: to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to look over/to examine/to check up/to ferret out
to learn of (an event)/to hear about (sth)
thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report
